creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: six panel screen with small paper leafs containing calligraphy or colorful images from the Tale of Genji against gold foil background painted with green grid patterns; tarnished silver and blue boarders across top and bottom

object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Fifty-four Scenes from the Tale of Genji
